topics.body:
Did you know... The song that a little girl who is singing in the background is actually a song of the old Disney Pinocchio movie called: "There are no strings on me"? Something that Ultron said in the end of the trailer?

[spoiler]!http://i.imgur.com/6uW3zAR.jpg![/spoiler] 

A big coincidence is, Robert Downey Jr. will act as Gueppetto in a future proyect.
